column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/03f498080a813850e1a3addf2c555450aa5e65c1 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
This looks like it will create problems if nBind+MIN_CORE_FILEDESCRIPTORS are > FD_SETSIZE...\nNot that I see any reason someone should bind more than 1024 ports...\n
